Name: VBOX Sim
About the game: VBOX Sim is a new and exciting way to go faster, using the same tools sim racing that professional racing drivers use in the real world! VBOX Sim allows you to capture race data and video from your favourite racing game, and analyze laps in the popular Circuit Tools application - the quickest way to go faster. The following games are supported: iRacing rFactor rFactor2 Project Cars Project Cars 2 Assetto Corsa Assetto Corsa Competizione F1 2017 F1 2018 F1 2019 F1 2020 For an even more authentic experience, VBOX Sim is compatible with the VBOX Laptimer (purchased separately), as used in car for giving instant driver feedback. Includes Circuit Tools - accessible via the help tab.
